channel.title: Server
channel.description:
Can anybody help me ???
I Made a new server but if i logg on i log in to hybridscape !!! pls help me
thx 4 help
~Fonzator ~

item.title: Server
item.dc:creator: @gunztheduel gunztheduel
item.description:
@gunztheduel wrote:

um dude look for tutorials for help on making a server its simple

  1. download other people’s server files or “source”

  2. option :
    -sign up for a no-ip account on no-ip website and search there on how to make a host
    -download hamachi

  3. if you downloaded hamachi then go to this site
    http://192.168.1.1/ - default router ip : username admin pass admin
    and go to a “port forwarding” website to help u create a server on ur router

  4. if you use hamachi then go back to ur router ip and remember the name of ur server (when u do the steps to “portforwarding” then you should have chose a server name and listed it on ur router ip site), then open up hamachi, when u first open up hamachi it will show u a quick guide how to use it and it will tell u how to create a new network. then type in the name of ur server on the network and stay logged on.

  5. compile ur server by going into ur source folder and click on “compile” (the cog file thing) then leave the compiler on then click on another cog file the most common name for that other cog file is “runserver” click on it and leave that on too.

6)use moparscape client click “new server” on the “file” button at the top left corner and,

  • if u use hamachi, ur hamachi address (should be written clearly when you open hamachi) and click “port” and enter ur port (you will know how to make a port wen u do “port forwarding” lol)

-if u use no-ip u dont have to open hamachi or do that port forwarding stuff just sign up and create a new host (or no-ip address that ur gonna use for ur server address) and compile and run ur server and log in and ur done =)

wow u dont even need to read a tut lol that was like 20 mins of thinking of wat to write and typing all dis out

Read full topic

put name of ur ham name there then password then press ok.
